taskFiles.title: Implement 'npx agentic15 plan archive' command
taskFiles.description: Create command to archive completed plan with auto-branch creation and PR workflow
completionCriteria: Command creates branch automatically (admin/archive-plan-{id})
Archives plan to .claude/plans/archived/{planId}/
Updates ACTIVE-PLAN file
Commits, pushes, and creates PR
Provides clear next-step instructions

taskFiles.title: Implement 'npx agentic15 plan new' command
taskFiles.description: Create command to start new plan with auto-branch creation and PR workflow
completionCriteria: Command creates branch automatically (admin/new-plan or feature/plan-{id})
Creates new plan structure with unique ID
Prompts for initial tasks or generates from description
Updates ACTIVE-PLAN file
Commits, pushes, and creates PR
Provides clear next-step instructions

taskFiles.title: Fix command permissions to allow read-only git commands
taskFiles.description: Update command restrictions to allow safe read-only git commands while blocking destructive ones
completionCriteria: Allow: git status, git branch --show-current, git log, git diff (read-only)
Allow: git remote get-url, git rev-parse, git describe
Block: git commit, git push, git checkout, git merge (write operations)
Block: git reset, git rebase, git cherry-pick (destructive)
Update settings.json with new permission rules
Test all read-only commands work
Test all write commands are blocked

taskFiles.title: Create separate Azure DevOps README section
taskFiles.description: Add Azure DevOps integration documentation to main README.md with clear separation from GitHub
completionCriteria: Add 'Platform Integration' section to README
Separate subsections for GitHub and Azure (no mixing)
Include Azure setup instructions (az CLI, authentication)
Include Azure configuration examples
Add platform detection explanation
Link to detailed docs in Agent/docs/
Update overview to mention dual-platform support

taskFiles.title: Prepare and publish npm package
taskFiles.description: Version bump, build, test, and publish package to npm registry
completionCriteria: Bump version in package.json (minor version for new feature)
Run all tests to verify package integrity
Test package locally with 'npm pack'
Update CHANGELOG.md with Azure integration release notes
Publish to npm with 'npm publish --access public'
Verify package is available on npm registry
Test installation from npm
